columns.name: logical_resource_id
columns.description: The logical name of the resource specified in the template.

columns.name: stack_name
columns.description: The name associated with the stack.

columns.name: description
columns.description: User defined description associated with the resource.

columns.name: physical_resource_id
columns.description: The name or unique identifier that corresponds to a physical instance ID of a resource supported by CloudFormation.

columns.name: resource_status_reason
columns.description: Success/failure message associated with the resource.

columns.name: drift_information
columns.description: Information about whether the resource's actual configuration differs, or has drifted, from its expected configuration, as defined in the stack template and any values specified as template parameters. For more information, see Detecting Unregulated Configuration Changes to Stacks and Resources.

columns.name: module_info
columns.description: Contains information about the module from which the resource was created, if the resource was created from a module included in the stack template.
